CREATE TABLE Court_Decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_title VARCHAR(255),
    judge_name VARCHAR(100),
    decision_date DATE,
    summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Legal_Precedents (
    precedent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    precedent_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_level VARCHAR(50),
    decision_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE Judges (
    judge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(100),
    years_on_bench INT,
    court_assigned VARCHAR(50)
)

    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(100),
    organization VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)
